Articles.Content:
Hi, as you can see on this screenshot the limit of the atmosphere isn't very smooth https://imgur.com/4J3RHTr

So i'm looking for someone who could tell me how to get it smoother ( maybe with scatterer but i've already tried to configure it as i'd like but i don't find the good setting )
